review.reviewBody: The broth was excellent today for the wonton soup! Hit the spot as I recover from the flu.

I could tell the Sweet and Sour chicken would have been tasty in the restaurant, but it was delivered with the sauce already on it, not on the side like other places I've had, so it was mushy and inedible, I ended up throwing most of it out. I'd order from here again, but nothing fried or breaded.
nice and hot, driving it home myself, I could still enjoy warm dishes.
